org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql
Class AeSQLAttachmentStorageProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeSQLObject
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeAbstractSQLStorage
          org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeAbstractSQLStorageProvider
              org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.sql.AeSQLAttachmentStorageProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeAttachmentStorageProvider, IAeStorageProvider
public class AeSQLAttachmentStorageProvider
extends AeAbstractSQLStorageProvider
implements IAeAttachmentStorageProvider

This is a SQL Attachment Storage provider (an implementation of IAeQueueStorageDelegate).
